oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Zina Bradley Chatfield, a USCT officer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full-plate tintype, approximately 5" x 7", hand-colored head and shoulders portrait of Zina Bradley Chatfield (1828-1923). Photograph probably taken after the war. Chatfield enlisted in Co. A, 4th Minn. Inf. Regt. on September 27, 1861. He was commissioned an officer in Co. F., U. S. Colored Troops, 58th Inf. Regt., on September 29, 1863. He mustered out on April 30, 1866.
